original_text: And the Lord spake suddenly unto Moses, and unto Aaron, and unto Miriam, Come out ye three unto the tabernacle of the congregation. And they three came out.
korean_text: 여호와께서 갑자기 모세와 아론과 미리암에게 이르시되 너희 세 사람은 회막으로 나아오라 하시니 그 세 사람이 나아가매

sentences.original_text: And the Lord spake suddenly unto Moses
and unto Aaron, and unto Miriam
Come out ye three unto the tabernacle of the congregation
